html:
strong people glorify thee. This refers to the Lord's righteous people (Job 17:9), both the house of Israel (Gen. 25:23) and the Gentiles who serve the Lord. In the last days, they will glorify (praise) the name of the Lord because of his mighty work of cleansing the earth of the wicked and redeeming the righteous.

city of the terrible nations shall fear thee. The New International Version reads "cities of ruthless nations will revere you." This may speak of the people who will remain after the destruction at Christ's coming and then become converted and worship the Lord (Ps. 86:9; Zech. 14:16).
